name: Time Attack Reloaded
description:
Back to author page

Time Attack Reloaded is a racing game based on the "Blueprint Time Attack Racer" tutorial made by Epic for Unreal Engine 4. I've converted all the the project classes to C++ and I've made the custom map with free assets I've borrowed from Epic's sample projects.

This short non-commercial  game has been made as a project for the Game Engine Programming exam during the Master in Game Development @ Università degli Studi di Verona.

My Contribution:

  • I ported the blueprint game logic of the project (checkpoints, race manager, time converter, player controller, vehicle respawn ) in C++
  • I designed and created the map using UE4 built-in editor, the landscape tools and the blueprint materials
  • I configured the lights, the post processing effects and the fog to create the right color result and atmosphere
  • I designed and created the UI through blueprint

Platform: Windows PC

Engine: Unreal Engine 4

Language: C++, Blueprint

Team size: 1
